sellingSection.title: Selling on Droplinked
sellingSection.description: Selling on Droplinked is easy, transparent, and efficient. Follow our step-by-step guide to launch a product and start reaching customers quickly.

customizableSection.title: Customizable Storefront
customizableSection.description: Create a unique storefront that reflects your brand identity. Customize colors, fonts, layouts, and more to create a memorable shopping experience for your customers.
